column4: in the theme manager on ubuntu, i clicked install, selected the theme file, and then it says that the theme was installed, but it wont show up in the theme manager... does anyone know why this is happening?
So... I suppose no one can help?
Its probably because all the teachers are on drugs now :P
I don't like no child left behind.. the kids that are struggling need a separate class
sorry, someone brought it up and i thought i would finish my thought.
but yeah.. is there anyone here that can help me with my theme problem?
heh, please don't ask to ask a question, please just ask the question :)
please just wait a moment. sometimes people need to research a question so it takes a minute.
you're on gutsy i assume? and can you further describe "theme manager"? is this with metacity?
very sorry, honestly i use Emerald so i'm not that familiar.
well then compiz is not running currently. do you have DRI enabled? (find out by "glxinfo | grep direct")
sorry about that. something came up. as far as the window problem you can either alt+f2 and then emerald replace, or use the "disown" command to gain your terminal back
how do i get back to the other window manager?
you may need to compile and run fusion-icon using git, go to #compiz-fusion for more info
